column4: hi guys .. strange issue.. I cannot install any themes ..Themes>> install theme >> then selecect the theme file  ( sleekdragon.tar.gz), , it says file format error

- yes, same trouble here irritating isn't it. - there is an answer. after opening themes from the menu selector. open the file browser nautilus and CTRL+H to unhide os files drop your them in  .themes. use the menu to select it.
